name: 张诚浩
introduction: Seong-Ho(Jay) is a leading expert in VFX and film-making in general in Korea. Coming from a visual communication background, Jay started off storyboarding feature films in his early twenties and later was recognized as a pioneer for introducing VFX to South Korean films. Since then, he has been responsible for much of the VFX in Korean films, setting new benchmarks and pushing boundaries in quality media content since 1995. His expansive list of VFX work includes films such as Joint Security Area (2000), Tidal Wave (2009), Sector 7 (2011), Spartacus (2010), Last Knights (2015) and many more.Jay has not only been a VFX supervisor but has collaborated with many directors and writers as a script doctor, editor, storyboard artist and a color consultant. He was responsible for re-writing and editing the 2010 film Bedeviled which was officially selected to the Cannes film festival and picked up numerous awards around the world.
